dt: {bc}lasting or occurring over a {a_link|decade} or about a decade

dt.t: A {wi}decade-long{/wi} drought in Saskatchewan and Alberta nesting areas has cut sharply into the number of birds migrating into Idaho …

shortdef: lasting or occurring over a decade or about a decade
